nodes.text: Czerka 431 was a scenario for Star Wars Miniatures: Knights of the Old Republic, that was written by Sterling Hershey and added to Wizards.com on October 1, 2008.
On December 2 2008, the story of this scenario continued in a second scenario, Permanent Demotion.
During the Jedi Civil War, Czerka Corp sold to both sides. Joni Ree, a scientest at Czerka 431 has gotten tired of the arrangement and has leaked its location to the Galactic Republic for a rescue.
